references.paper_title: Magic Fixup: Streamlining photo editing by watching dynamic videos
references.reason: This paper proposes a novel method for interactive image editing by leveraging video data to capture the dynamics of real-world interactions, which is a key inspiration for the current work.

references.paper_title: Stable Video Diffusion: Scaling latent video diffusion models to large datasets
references.reason: This paper introduces Stable Video Diffusion, a powerful video diffusion model which serves as the foundation for the proposed FramePainter model.

references.paper_title: Drag your GAN: Interactive point-based manipulation on the generative image manifold
references.reason: This paper introduces DragGAN, a pioneering work in interactive image editing that uses intuitive visual instructions, which is highly relevant to the work presented.

references.paper_title: Hierarchical text-conditional image generation with CLIP latents
references.reason: This paper introduces a method for text-guided image generation using CLIP latents which is a foundation for many text-to-image related works referenced in the current work.

references.paper_title: High-resolution image synthesis with latent diffusion models
references.reason: This paper introduces high-resolution image synthesis with latent diffusion models which is also a foundation for many image generation related works referenced in the current work.
